text: CLOSE SportsPulse : NFL insiders give their biggest takeaways from Week 2 including a dominant defensive outing from the Cowboys and the Jaguars statement win over the Patriots. USA TODAY Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Carson Wentz warms up on the field during training camp at the NovaCare Complex. ( Photo : Suchat Pederson, The News Journal - USA TODAY NETWO ) PHILADELPHIA – Carson Wentz will be the Eagles ’ starting quarterback on Sunday. Head coach Doug Pederson announced Monday the third - year signal caller has been medically cleared nine months after tearing his left anterior cruciate ligament and will lead the Birds ’ offense against the Colts at Lincoln Financial Field. “ He ’ s cleared, he goes, ” P
